attacks.name: Super Eggsplosion
attacks.effect: Discard any number of Energy cards attached to any of your Pokémon. Flip a number of coins equal to the number of Energy cards discarded this way. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Called Shot
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage times the amount of Grass Energy to Exeggutor. (Don't apply Weakness or Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
